website_summaries.verdict: The Nikon Coolpix S70 has a top-notch touch-screen interface and eye-catching design, but you're definitely paying for them.
cons: battery charging done in camera might bother some

customer_reviews.title: Nikon is a necessity to create NIFTY Photos!
customer_reviews.text: Nikon is a necessity to create NIFTY Photos! My new Coolpix S70 is great and performs flawlessly to my own abilities. My only request would be an instructional video /DVD to achieve all the capabilities included in this tiny package. I initially purchased this camera with thoughts of the S70 allowing my sweetheart, a C6 Quadriplegic to take photos because of the touch screen command interface. Eureka! It works for her. We are both very happy with that capability. Just learning to operate the S70 now, so I will discover more features as I add skills. Great Product. Nikon Glass is the best. The size of camera should lend itself to "Stealh" photo opportunities.
customer_reviews.author: K. James

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy used
customer_reviews.text: It was ok camera if it actually worked I think. I always had a problem with it and had to get it fixed once and it didn’t help getting it fixed. It stopped working a few months later after that
customer_reviews.author: jeff harkins

customer_reviews.title: Big problems
customer_reviews.text: The features are great, the design of the touch screen is clever, but if you default to the touch screen, it is way too easy to mistakenly touch the screen and take photos you don't want. But, most importantly, I'm surprised by the other reviewers who say the photos are great as I think the photo quality is very poor. I've tried various auto options and have tested all the manual settings and cannot get a really good photo. I'm not new to Nikon - I've had other Nikon Coolpix cameras that I loved and I also have the Nikon D300 SLR and have been a Nikon owner for 40 years but this one is the worst...sorry to say!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is great. I had the S60 and was a little disappointed with the response time to the touch screen, but they have fixed all of that with the S70. The screen brightness is great and the touch is responsive. The internal optical zoom is nice and you don't have lens moving outside of the case. The only downside (minor) is the lens is in the top left corner and at first was easily covered by your finger when you hold the camera. This was easy to see and correct. Quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: SLY

customer_reviews.title: No good!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is bad! I have gone through every single mode on this camera and can not get one clear picture. I did buy it refurbished so maybe it's a lemon. My camera phone takes better pics. I took this camera to a camera shop and they told me that the camera would be junk even if it was not refurbished. They told me I should give it to a kid to play with, a good starter camera for a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: ITS OK Not excellent but AOK to have in your glove box
customer_reviews.text: the placement of the MIC is problematic I kept covering it up so I had to use a selfie Stick and or a pedestal to eliminate that worry. Other than that its OK
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey G.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my husband's birthday and was a little hesitant due to some of the reviews. He does not have use of his fingers, but uses his knuckles for anything with a touch-screen application. Some applications recognize the knuckle and others don't. This camera was awesome!!! He uses it with ease and has loved being able to take pictures! The touch-screen zoom, flash, review, etc is all extremely accessible. The picture quality is great 90% of the time. You can always default to using the "button" on top of the camera to take pictures. The battery life is excellent and really the whole product is a dream come true.
customer_reviews.author: courtnayb@yahoo.com

customer_reviews.title: A pain
customer_reviews.text: While this camera takes nice pictures, the screen being a touch type keeps getting touched and changing things. I will attempt to take a picture and it won't do it because I have changed some selection on the touch screen by holding it and touching the screen. I bought it because I'm in construction and the telescoping type get dirt and debris in them and fail to work. This is my 3rd Nikon and I have always been happy with them. I guess my hands are to big.
customer_reviews.author: Derald

customer_reviews.title: Nikon S70 Point and Shoot Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: The Nikon S70 Coolpix Digital Camera is built well and has some really nice features. My biggest disappointment with this camera is picture clarity. All pictures I have taken are out of focus and blurred. Until Nikon can correct this S70 picture clarity issue of focusing, I cannot recommend this camera at all. I had to return the camera back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: rsparkie

customer_reviews.title: horrible pictures
customer_reviews.text: I had a Sony Cybershot that got dropped and unfortunately needed replaced. I wanted a touch screen and after reading reviews went with this camera. I have had it several months and am horribly disappointed. I just returned from vacation and the pictures are just all horrible. After comparing them with last years pictures and am contacting Nikon because it is just sad how all my pictures look.
customer_reviews.author: natmommy

customer_reviews.title: Smartphones are now replacing this style of camera.
customer_reviews.text: The camera is handy for carrying in a belt holster for quick access when the need arises. There are more comparable cameras on the market now that provide better lens adjustment, picture quality (this unit is already12 pixel) & automated functions.........i.e. Smartphones!
customer_reviews.author: Jellum

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camera!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great!! Takes some amazing pics!! So many features!! And touchscreen!! Woot! Don't read the stupid retarded posts about the camera not taking good pics. There is so many adj you can do to the camera it's almost like the big brothers of this nikon dude!! If you want a small camera to take around that takes amazing pics this is it!! I was just in puerto Rico, grand Turk, st. Thomas and Bermuda!!! Took over 2000 pics with it and uploaded them right to my iPad on the trip!! What I am saying is if you want fast portable amazing good looking pics then this is it!! Have fun!!! =D
customer_reviews.author: Bhewy

customer_reviews.title: Worst camera I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to reviews. This camera couldn't focus well and somehow got a lot of dust under the lens, making flash photos full of specs. The touch screen was unresponsive and not very intuitive and awkward to take photos with. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Flying Fish

customer_reviews.title: Not so good at night time shot
customer_reviews.text: Just bought the camera used last week for 42 dollars. This is my first Nikon Camera and I am very disappointed. It was awful when I took some shot indoors and outdoors in the night time hours. I recommend Panasonic ZS series or Canon if you want to buy a nice point and shoot camera.
customer_reviews.author: A Phillies' Fan

customer_reviews.title: Nikon S70
customer_reviews.text: I gave this camera to my wife and the photos she takes are out of focus. That is not a good thing for an automatic focus camera. The photos look great on camera but when downloaded or printed they look terrible. I sent it back. My daughter said she had the same experience with Nikon point and shoots.
customer_reviews.author: Man

customer_reviews.title: Great digital camera
customer_reviews.text: This is maybe my 4th or 5th digital camera. The best thing about the camera is the touchscreen interface. It is so much like using an iPhone (I'm certain they used the iPhone/iPod as inspiration). My only problem is that my daughter likes this so much better than her Sony, that I'm probably going to have to purchase another!
customer_reviews.author: lbates

customer_reviews.title: Nikon CoolPix S70
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Nikon is one of my favorite brands. Got to chose my camera as a Christmas gift form my parents. Liked all the different color choices. 12.1 megapixels and a touchscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel D. Villa

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. The button on the top of the camera for taking pictures gets in the way sometimes when using the touch screen to take pictures. Sometimes get blurry pictures. I'm used to my Cannon Rebel xTi EOS and I just like that camera better.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hanley

customer_reviews.title: NIKON COOLPIX S70
customer_reviews.text: I love my new camera. I purchased it once I saw my friend's camera. I am happy that I purchased the camera on Amazon because I would have spent over $80 more purchasing it at BestBuy. I had a HP camera about 4-5 yrs ago but the touch option and the scene options makes each picture turn out great. I researched the best camera for the past 2yrs and according to Consumer Reports in 2009 Nikon was the best for easy to use cameras and great pics!
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Kenya Stiger

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my girlfriend for her bday
customer_reviews.text: And she loved it! Up until I got her a new phone with a decent camera attached. Smh good camera but in reality unless your a passionate photographer just get a decent phone most people now (out of convenience usually) just use their phones
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix S70
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Easy to use. Access to pictures is great. Best price through Amazon and Walmart. This was bought for a gift. Reciever of gift happy with it and ease of use. Dec. 9, 2012 I have had the red one for 3 years no problems with it. Bought another for to give as a gift. Has no problems
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: When I first received camera I thought it was going to be complicated to use. Upon using it I found it pretty easy to use. At first I was going to return it but change my mine after getting acustomed to it.
customer_reviews.author: sanman1973

customer_reviews.title: very nice simple camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is thin and very simple and the pictures are very nice happy this it
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: easy to use/shake resistant
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace my camera since the one I bought was just not working out. Had a cyber-shot before the last and loved it, but checked out the nikon that a friend had. This camera is very easy to use and can be used on the back of the bike for some awesome photos!! Can't wait to try out all the features of this camera.
customer_reviews.author: W. Schnetzer

customer_reviews.title: I have the greatest husband EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wonderful husband got me this camera for Christmas and I LOVE it!!! I don't have a bad thing to say about it! I hate most touch screens, but I really am finding that I really like this one! I would recommend this camera to anyone and everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jan James

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Pictures...Great features
customer_reviews.text: I was so anxious to receive this camera. I have a canon EOS 5D and wanted to have a smaller camera to carry to quick events. I received the camera and looked over all the features. They were great. I took some indoor pictures and they turned out grainy. I tried several different ISO's and changed some other features, the quaily of the indoor/low light pictures never improved. I had to return the camera. Nikon created an awesome feature camera, but needs to improve on low light condition features.
customer_reviews.author: ProudArmyWife

customer_reviews.title: This is the best camera I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best camera I have ever owned; wouldnt trade it for anything else. Nikon brands are always 'tops' for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ann S

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: An older camera which worked great. Replaced it with a newer Nikon.
customer_reviews.author: Fred R. Benford

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 5 months and then it died. Totally disappointed with this product. Would not buy another touch screen from Nikon.
customer_reviews.author: dgentry

customer_reviews.title: Can't Beat Nikon
customer_reviews.text: Good Camera at a great price the one I got used looks and works like new. If it came with the original box I could even give it as a gift it looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R Skelton

customer_reviews.title: alright camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera constantly creates picture with dots all over, I think due to the fact that the from lens gets dirty too easily. I like the design of the camera and it is a cool idea to take pictures by tapping the back of the camera but overall picture quality is not up to par with a camera in this price range. I would recommend another camera if someone asked which point and shoot to buy.
customer_reviews.author: squeege

customer_reviews.title: Picture Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera! Small, ready to take pictures as soon as you slide the shutter cover down, does excellent pictures and video, AND it is touch screen too! Battery lasts a long time, and charges pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Holden

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This camera does every thing I had hoped ... It's small, handy, and easy to use. It takes great pictures & videos
customer_reviews.author: Maria Graziano

customer_reviews.title: Newark, NJ
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful camera. The pictures are very clear and bright. With such a small camera, I didn't expect such clarity. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: silly desk

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Best portable camera I ever had. I'm used to work with SLR Nikon (pro cam) and needed to buy a portable one. Great features, very good image quality, size is perfect and is amazingly easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Great package bad camera
customer_reviews.text: Every thing about the camera, Nikon's S70, was just what we wanted BUT just like many others found out, it just didn't do a good job of doing the very thing you need a camera for and that of course is the pictures. The pictures were so bad we returned the camera a bought a different brand. By the way Amazon's returned policy did work very well and exceeded my highest expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed :(
customer_reviews.text: This had so much potential. Great features / great style but im not kidding the picture quality is badddd. It's a little better when you plug into the computer and look on there but you would think an OLED screen pictures would look gorgeous. Feels cheap, especially for [..]. Shipped back immediately. Review: [..]
customer_reviews.author: Alex O

customer_reviews.title: amazing camera
customer_reviews.text: i read all the reviews before ordering this camera, most were actually pretty negative, but having owned a nikon prior to this decided to go with it. completely LOVE it. it takes great pictures, after you get used to it and all it's features. not that hard to get used to though. and the touch screens easy and fun.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Nice little camera
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but not that impressed with performance. Still continuing to look for the perfect pocket camera.
customer_reviews.author: NH Wifey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use with touch screen small and compact for point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C.

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix ... Cool Camera!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with purchase! Love having this on me all the time so that I can take candid pics!
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Excellent point and shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera overall for a point and shoot. The only issues I have with this camera is that there isn't much zoom and the interface is somewhat difficult to learn and use. The video quality is good. It is a great sized camera to take with you anywhere and it still takes great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: T. Reich

customer_reviews.title: Point and Shoot.
customer_reviews.text: Grea Point and Shoot.Fits nice in the pocket and takes great pictures. Must be mindful to keep finger out of the view finder.
customer_reviews.author: The Truth

customer_reviews.title: I love my Nikon Coolpix S70
customer_reviews.text: I love my Nikon Coolpix S70. Still trying to learn all the capibilities I'll have with this camera. It's complex but love it. The price was right. Could not have afforded a new one. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Linda Adams

customer_reviews.title: Nikon S70
customer_reviews.text: Camera is a great deal of fun to use, however, I have noticed it is a little slow when snapping pictures. Otherwise it takes great pictures and is a comfortable size.
customer_reviews.author: K. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Just a good looking camera
customer_reviews.text: The images are sometimes good but since day one I've been having problems taking pix with a lot of artificial light it shows static on the screen and the pictures come out really blurry, the camera is good to look at, but the quality of the pix aren't that good most of the time it works fine but sometimes the images are just awful
customer_reviews.author: Orihime

customer_reviews.title: just died after 2 weeks of having it
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to have this camera, and then it just stopped working dead in it's tracks. I never dropped it, no water got on it, and I only had it for 2 weeks before it stopped working. Now I have to mail it to an address on the warrenty that has no contact phone number avaliable. How do I know how long or when and if it's coming back. So Lame.
customer_reviews.author: bizzled

customer_reviews.title: coolpix
customer_reviews.text: only wish zoom was a bit better..bought this as a gift for my 10 year old. Easy for him to use and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: jayjay

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is my favorite new toy. It's small, handy, and easy to use. It takes great pictures & videos without having to carry two devices. I have a DSLR and wanted something smaller as well as quick. I like that the screen is large and works through touch. It makes scrolling through pictures as well as zooming in and out a cinch.
customer_reviews.author: Sew Keeli

customer_reviews.title: Great Camara
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of online research before selecting the Nikon S70 as a christmas present for my wife. I have a 35mm Nikon and love it. After seeing a nikon ad I looked into it. My wife could not be happier with the choice I made. The software makes downloading and storing pictures a snap. Overall I give this little gem 5 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Edward M. Chrzaszcz

customer_reviews.title: best xmas present ever
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, My daughter loves the touch screen and fun features that comes on the menu. This camera can shoot HD video as well. A great xmas present. Totally recommend it for these internet savy, picture and video shooting crazied kids.
customer_reviews.author: dooby

customer_reviews.title: YAYYYY!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST PURCHASE MADE!!!! THE COLOR IS POPPING, THE PRICE WAS AMAZING AND MY PICTURES ARE PRICELESS....NEED I SAY MORE
customer_reviews.author: Deebs

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix S70
customer_reviews.text: This is one fantastic camera! The compact size makes it easy to carry everywhere. The touch screen, and the picture quality are unsurpassed.
customer_reviews.author: John V. Hyer

customer_reviews.title: nikon s70
customer_reviews.text: It's an excellent camera for the price. There are alot of features that I haven't figured out, but setting it on Auto has been great to get pictures of the kids. I would recommend this camera to anyone looking for a realiable camera without too many bells and whistles.
customer_reviews.author: femc1980

customer_reviews.title: s70 had poor night photos
customer_reviews.text: very...extremely poor lighting when taking photos at night indoors. Had to return camera as this could not take photos of indoor parties. sorry....was hoping that it was just as good as the S 60.
customer_reviews.author: B. Eng

customer_reviews.title: s70 camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Takes really nice pictures with pretty decent quality. Sometimes menus can get me turned around when im messing around with the settings but overall its a good camera that i am happy with.
customer_reviews.author: blackhawk

customer_reviews.title: it's okay
customer_reviews.text: This is a good camera but I am realizing I don't like digital zoom. This features are easy to navigate and the battery life is good. I would recommend it for what I use it for, a second camera to my digital SLR, but not to much else. I certainly wouldn't use it as my only camera, it doesn't stop action to well, the flash doesn't recycle quickly and the digital zoom is clumsy and limited.
customer_reviews.author: valgirl

customer_reviews.title: Best Value and Easy to Use Camera out there
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding camera. It is very user friendly and the quality of the pics are incredible. Battery life is much better than expected. Highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Der JaegerMeister

customer_reviews.title: Pictures not so cool
customer_reviews.text: Coolpix S70 takes good pictures under normal light without flash. Takes good pictures indoors with dim light without flash. But using flash indoors results in too white (washed) picture. Design, construction and most features are excellent. But I didn't like the feature that uses only Nikon Transfer or ViewNX to transfer pictures to computer. I wish there is a way to transfer photos to PC with just a USB cable and put the pictures in any folder you want. Coolpix limits you to ViewNX only.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Recio

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix S70
customer_reviews.text: Still learning the details after a month, but everything is just as we'd hoped. Size, functionality, versatility is great.
customer_reviews.author: LA User

customer_reviews.title: great disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This is pobably the worst Nikon product that I have ever had. picture quality is really bad and LCD...worst. However, it is a great camera for a five year old. it will keep a 5'yo busy and amazed.
customer_reviews.author: GGjay

customer_reviews.title: Never buy
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to get a clear picture with this machine! Pure illusion! Not indicate to anyone, I'm over 4 months with my no achieve success in the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Fragata

customer_reviews.title: Nikon S-70 Camera
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera for it's features and looks. Had to return it -- wouldn't take a charge. The next one -- same problem ! TWICE BURNT Having paid $230.+, we ONLY got $179.99 credited back to us -- 80%!!! I've done a lot of shopping at ' Amazon'in the past. This is how we got rewarded for THEM sending us faulty merchandise. THANK YOU, AMAZON.COM, we're shopping elsewhere from now-on !!!
customer_reviews.author: H. Pauls

customer_reviews.title: Good job Nikon,you did it again.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera,have all the best features,great sharp pictures,i belive nikon did a great job with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Neftali Alverio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love photography always have the best in camera's. This is the best camera I have ever had! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Patty Johnson

customer_reviews.title: about the camera
customer_reviews.text: my daughter wanted the cheapest one but me, i wanted the best one for her. she got it for christmas from santa clause and she loves it. she uses it all the time. glad santa bought the nicest one for her.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard A. Brungs

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Nice product although I don't/didn't use it much bought for my 17 yr old ganddaughter--she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Jim Patrick

customer_reviews.title: oh yeah baby!
customer_reviews.text: if my wife could learn the settings I am sure it would take better pictures than it does...
customer_reviews.author: C. Corp

customer_reviews.title: Greatest little camera
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera! It is easy to use and has so many features that I don't believe you are able to take a bad picture! The only problem is that in very bright sunlight it is difficult to see the screen, but the many plus features far out weighs the one problem area. The touch screen makes it so much fun. Great zoom capabilities, and awesome portraits. Haven't tried the panorama trick yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Moore

customer_reviews.title: T's views
customer_reviews.text: This camera does every thing I had hoped ikt would do and so much much more. I's as if I now own a small compact SLR camera. I cant wait to learn all the features that this camera offers.
customer_reviews.author: T. yarde

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very poor picture quality. Can't believe it. My $100 Canon did a much better job. The quality of the pictures is similar to a disposable camera you buy at Wal-Mart.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Do not like this camera at all! It has a very bad delay so horrible at taking kids pictures. I am sure if just using to take still objects it is a nice camera with great features but do NOT recommend it to take pics of anything that moves. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie L. Steffes

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT BROKEN!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS CAMERA DID NOT WORK AND I HAD TO SEND IT BACK TO THE NIKON COMPANY SO IT COULD BE FIXED... I WAS HIGHLY UPSET ABOUT THIS PURCHASE DO TO THE FACT THAT IT DID NOT WORK AND I PAID GOOD MONEY FOR IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: C.VASQUEZ JR.

customer_reviews.title: The best so far
customer_reviews.text: the best LED display, Easy to use and yet you can do your own setting. Sharp pictures and movies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon loyal buyer

customer_reviews.title: Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have had several digital cameras but this is the nicest ones I have used so far. Its screen is a bit sensitive but after I used it for a bit, that wasn't really a problem. Beautiful pictures that download easily. It will take higher quality pictures than my system at work can handle but I just readjust the camera's setting and we are good to go. Impressive to everyone who gets to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

product_meta.title: Nikon Coolpix S70 12.1MP Digital Camera with 3.5-inch OLED Touch Screen and 5x Wide Angle Optical Vibration Reduction (VR) Zoom (Black & Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black & BlackFROM THE MANUFACTURER
From the Manufacturer 

In Style with a Cool Touch. The next generation of touch display. 

Nikon’s sleek, sexy Coolpix S70 combines 12.1 effective megapixels and 5x wide-angle zoom with a beautiful, bright 3.5-inch Clear Color High-Resolution Organic LED touch-panel display that makes taking and sharing pictures easy. The Coolpix S70 combines Nikon’s 5-way Optical VR Image Stabilization system and a touch shutter that gets you sharp pictures throughout the zoom range. The Coolpix S70 features Nikon’s Smart Portrait System that enables you to get great portraits with a touch of the shutter! The Coolpix S70 also features an HD (720p) Movie Mode. Now you can view HD movies on your computer and share them with family and friends! 

Vibrant Clear Color OLED touch screen operation and advanced functions served up in style with the tactile sophistication of dual texture design 



Featuring Nikon’s innovative Clear Color OLED display and a highly responsive capacitive touch screen, the Coolpix S70 is the smart and fashionable photographic tool that makes picture-taking a greater joy. 

The Coolpix S70 introduces Nikon’s newly developed 3.5-incg Clear Color OLED Display with refined touch control that offers a new level of intuitive fingertip shooting control and a variety of exciting playback options. 

OLED technology delivers the immediately recognizable benefits of vivid color reproduction, sharp contrast, and absence of afterimages. Nikon combines this with our own innovative Clear Color Display technology, making the large 3.5-inch OLED display a real eyeful. In addition highly responsive new capacitive touch screen technology adds the benefit of sure and immediate response at the lightest touch of the display’s surface for a fun and intuitive feel to every camera operation. 

Advanced new shooting features that leverage this quick and easy fingertip control include Touch Shutter, which, at a single touch, releases the shutter after focus and exposure are locked on the subject. In addition, new on-screen sliders provide touch control over brightness (exposure) and Scene Effect Adjustment. 

Touch control also makes viewing and retouching images more fun and efficient. The speed and ease of fingertip scrolling through images is matched only by the fun of using a pinching motion with two fingers to zoom in or out on displayed images, switch between thumbnail and full screen views, and so on. 

High-performance imaging capabilities include 12.1 effective megapixels of sharp resolution matched to the compositional freedom of a precision 5x zoom Nikkor lens that covers focal lengths from 28-140mm (35mm format equivalent). Advanced digital image-processing faithfully reproduces fine details and subtle tones, delivers quick response, and maintains image quality and clarity when taking advantage of extended light sensitivity settings as high as ISO 6400*. 

The Coolpix S70 features a slim body wrapped in a sumptuous dual texture design that pleases the eyes and the hands with its trendsetting good looks. 
*ISO 3200 and 6400 are available only for image sizes of 3M (2048 x 1536) or smaller. 

Nikon Coolpix S70 Feature Highlights 

EXPEED digital imaging technology
Nikon’s smarter approach to digital imaging technology. From image capture to processing, Nikon’s comprehensive EXPEED digital imaging concept encompasses the entire picture-taking operation. EXPEED is much more than a processing engine; it is a revolution in digital photography. 

New 3.5-inch Clear Color OLED Display with touch control 
The Coolpix S70 introduces a new 3.5-inch, wide-screen OLED Display with approx. 288k-dot resolution. In addition to the immediately recognizable benefits of vivid color reproduction and sharp contrast, OLED technology also improves power efficiency and allows for a thinner camera design. New capacitive touch screen technology ensures sure and immediate response to finger action on the display’s glass surface. Other features include anti-reflection coating and brightness adjustment. 

Five advanced image stabilizing features* for sharper results
VR image stabilization in action Nikon's Hybrid Optical lens shift and Electronic VR image stabilization systems combine to help produce blur-free images. High ISO 6400** capability allows faster shutter speeds when shooting in low light or capturing fast-moving subjects. Motion Detection automatically controls shutter speed and the ISO setting to compensate for subject movement and camera shake. And, Nikon’s original BSS (Best Shot Selector) function automatically shoots a series of sequential frames and saves the one with the sharpest focus. 
* The camera selects and uses only the features required to optimize each image.
** ISO 3200 and 6400 are available only for image sizes of 3M (2048 x 1536) or smaller. 

Nikon’s Smart Portrait System with Skin Softening
Face-priority AF helps produce more satisfying portraits by adjusting focus and exposure for as many as 12 faces in the framed shot. Skin Softening function detects and analyzes a framed subject’s skin, and then adjusts smoothness to produce enhanced results. Smile Timer automatically releases the shutter when the subject smiles, while its Blink Proof function shoots two sequential frames, then saves the one in which the subject’s eyes are widest open. Blink Warning presents an alert when it suspects that someone in the shot has blinked. In-Camera Red-Eye Fix automatically corrects any perceived red-eye effect before saving the image to memory. 








Intelligent automated shooting modes that promote carefree shooting
Nikon’s Scene Auto Selector makes it faster and easier to capture the moment by eliminating the need to manually select a scene mode to match the intended shot. This intelligent function determines the subject, analyzes the surrounding settings, and then automatically selects the appropriate scene mode for optimal results. Subject Tracking enhances the shooting experience by following the subject’s movement to ensure clear focus and quick response when that special shutter opportunity presents itself. Subject Tracking even functions if the subject moves out of the frame for a second or two. 

Quick Retouch
Quick Retouch automatically adjusts the contrast and saturation of selected photos to create an enhanced copy with the right finishing touch. 

Nikon Coolpix S70 Other Features

 *  D-Lighting in action 
 * Selection of three different stylish HOME screen displays 
 * Macro shooting from as close as 3 cm (1.2 in.) 
 * 16 handy scene modes for optimized shooting in various settings 
 * D-Lighting 
 * Active Zoom 
 * Versatile file sorting functions 
 * Four movie modes with sound 
 * Time zone function for easy setting of multiple locations 
 * Approx. 20 MB of internal memory 
 * Hi-Speed USB connectivity with USB charging via Charging AC Adapter EH-68P or PC 

What’s in the Box  * EN-EL12 Rechargeable Li-ion Battery 
 * EH-68P AC Adapter/Charger 
 * UC-E6 USB Cable 
 * EG-CP14 Audio Video Cable 
 * AN-CP19 Strap 
 * Coolpix Software Suite CD-ROM
